Unfold

Class Zoo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Unfold.Zoo

  • public class Zoo
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the creation of new creatures and storing them within an ArrayList.

    • Method Detail

      • createCreatures

        public java.util.ArrayList createCreatures(Square[][] squares,
                                           int creaturesCount,
                                           int columns,
                                           int rows)
        Handles the initial creation of creatures at program start
        Parameters:
        squares - two dimensional array of Square objects, aka simulation area
        creaturesCount - amount of creatures wanted within the simulation area
        columns - user defined amount of columns in the simulation area.
        rows - user defined amount of rows in the simulation area.
        Returns:
        returns an ArrayList of Creature objects.

      • createCreatures

        public java.util.ArrayList createCreatures(java.util.ArrayList<Creature> creatures,
                                           int[] motherRacialFeatures,
                                           int[] fatherRacialFeatures,
                                           int creaturesCount,
                                           int x,
                                           int y)
        Handles the creation of a new creature through mating within during simulation.
        Parameters:
        creatures - ArrayList containing currently living creatures.
        motherRacialFeatures - featuers of the female creature involved in mating.
        fatherRacialFeatures - featuers of the male creature involved in mating.
        creaturesCount - amount of creatures within the simulation.
        x - x-coordinate of where the mating is happening.
        y - y-coordinate of where the mating is happening.
        Returns:
        returns an updated ArrayList of creatures, with a new creature added.
